This is the first place i have tried paella, and they have set the bar.  The paella was great, but what I liked the most was the selection of olive oils that come with the bread.  They are some of the most flavorful olive oils I have ever had.  They charge 2 Euro for the bread without asking, but it's for all the bread you can eat.  So I ate about 4 baskets worth, after my meal of course.  I don't need to look at the menu, the seafood only paella is where it's at!
